net.sf.jclec.mo.experiment

Class MOExperiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclec.mo.experiment.MOExperiment

  • public class MOExperiment
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a MOO experiment. An experiment is comprised of one of more configuration files that will be executed by JCLEC-MOEA. This class facilitates the management of configuration files, thus allowing adding and removing them.

    HISTORY:

    • (AR|JRR|SV, 1.0, March 2018) First release.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aurora Ramirez (AR), Jose Raul Romero (JRR), Sebastian Ventura (SV)

    Knowledge Discovery and Intelligent Systems (KDIS) Research Group: http://www.uco.es/grupos/kdis

        public java.lang.String getConfiguration(int index)
        Get the configuration at a given position.
        Parameters:
        index - The position index.
        Returns:

      • getNumberOfConfigurations
